name: Distribute country-specific traffic insights from Google Analytics to Google Sheets and Slack
description:
Keep your team informed with automated weekly updates of country-specific user and session data from Google Analytics, synced to Google Sheets and shared on Slack. Modify the schedule effortlessly via the clock icon for seamless collaboration.
The scenario is scheduled to execute every Friday at 17:00 which you can change in the schedule setting by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
